overview: The WICKED gang is back in town... From Crime Scene to Courtroom, the girls are taking it to the wise guys, one hood at a time. Award winning director Brad Armstrong brings Wicked Girls Kaylani, Kirsten, Jessica, Alektra, and Mikayla together for a SIT DOWN like no other. If you liked Mobster's Ball, you're going to love this action packed sequel... It's guaranteed to be a big HIT!
title: Mobster's Ball 2
